modName: Shroutingale Armor - Ancient Shrouded Armor with Nightingale Armor model
summary:
If you're like me, you dont like the enchantments on the Nightingale armor, and you don't like the look of the Ancient Shrouded Armor.
So I thought to myself, why not combine the best of both worlds into one epic armor?!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3]Wow, thank you guys for over 150 downloads, though it will be appriciated if more would endorse! :DDD
[/size][/color]
If you're like me, you dont like the enchantments on the Nightingale armor, and you don't like the look of the Ancient Shrouded Armor.
So I thought to myself, why not combine the best of both worlds into one epic armor?!
And there you go, the Shroutingale Armor at it's full glory!

This mod just replaces the model and name of the Ancient Shrouded Armor, nothing more.
This is my first attempt on modding, and I'm happy with the result :P

If you have any isusse with the mod or any suggestions, please notify me!
author: idado3250
